I've got it running, let me know of any specific queries or sticking points=
,
What I have found is that because it runs as a midlet (i.e. on a real dev=
ice
or an emulator) I don't find it very useful for running frequent tests.=
 
I have a hunch that compiling a CLDC/MIDP environment on my normal
develo=
pment machine would provide a more useful framework for running tests
than =
running j2meUnit under the sun wireless toolkit.

Anybody else had much suc=
cess with j2me testing ?

J.
